mapper.sql: itemID, itemCode, ORG_NAME, ORG_CODE, ORG_DESCRIPTION, ORG_IDENTIFY, ORG_LOCATE, AUDIT_STATUS, REASON, LEFT, RIGHT, LEVEL, CREATER, itemCreateAt, UPDATER, itemUpdateAt
mapper.select: select AUDIT_STATUS from organization where itemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from organization where AUDIT_STATUS = "待审核" or AUDIT_STATUS = "市局审核已通过" or AUDIT_STATUS = "市局审核未通过"
select * from organization where AUDIT_STATUS = "待审核" or AUDIT_STATUS = "市局审核已通过" or AUDIT_STATUS = "省局审核已通过" or AUDIT_STATUS = "省局审核未通过"
select ORG_CODE from organization where itemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into organization (itemID, itemCode, ORG_NAME, ORG_CODE, ORG_DESCRIPTION, ORG_IDENTIFY, backup1, backup2, LEFT, RIGHT, LEVEL, CREATER, itemCreateAt, UPDATER, itemUpdateAt ) values (#{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgIdentify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backup1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backup2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{left,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{right,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemcreateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemupdateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update organization
itemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR},
ORG_NAME = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_DESCRIPTION = #{orgDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_IDENTIFY = #{orgIdentify,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_LOCATE = #{orgLocate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUDIT_STATUS = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEFT = #{left,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RIGHT = #{right,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemCreateAt = #{itemcreateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemUpdateAt = #{itemupdateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where itemID = #{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and itemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR}

update organization set itemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR}, ORG_NAME = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_DESCRIPTION = #{orgDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_IDENTIFY = #{orgIdentify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, backup1 = #{backup1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, backup2 = #{backup2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEFT = #{left,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RIGHT = #{right,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemCreateAt = #{itemcreateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemUpdateAt = #{itemupdateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where itemID = #{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
